TopicTitle: Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics - Creations

Articles.Content:
Post your creations that use Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics mod.

Edited January 10, 2015 by hellblazer
This exchange of spacecraft needs to be moved to the Spacecraft Exchange.

Alright already! Moved. Jeez!

But you know, posting in the thread really doesn't call moderator attention to something, guys, unless we happen to run across it while browsing. Hitting the 'report' button or bringing it up in this thread, on the other hand, works much better.
while browsing, happens that i found this thread and i wish to see a lot of creations using this mod. so... why not revive it? i seriously need some pics for me to get the way of it.
